Name: track_product_backlog的任务状态
Description: CB tracks the state of tasks in the Product Backlog.

Name: ensure_sprintbacklog task availability
Description: Ensure all tasks in the Sprint Backlog are available to work on.

Name: track_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Monitor which sprint goals have been achieved during sprints.

Name: monitor_work_in_progress tasks
Description: WIP contains all active tasks that are neither completed nor blocked.

Name: ensure_sprintbacklog task feasibility
Description: Ensure all tasks in the Sprint Backlog are feasible to complete within the sprint duration.

Name: track_user_story acceptance rate
Description: User Stories' acceptance rates must be tracked over time.

Name: minimize_sprint_backlog_task_blockers
Description: Minimize the number of blockers assigned to tasks in the Sprint Backlog.

Name: maximize_user_story_priority
Description: Maximize user stories' priority levels within features.

Name: track_sprint_goal_progress
Description: Monitor progress towards completing sprint goals.

Name: minimize_user_story_effort
Description: Minimize the total effort required to complete user stories within features.
